meanings.definition: Free from a burden or burdens.
meanings.sent1: She felt unburdened after finishing her homework.
meanings.sent2: The bird flew unburdened through the clear sky.
meanings.sent3: The backpack looked unburdened after she removed all the heavy books.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt unburdened as he forgave his friend.
meanings.sent5: The unburdened mind was able to focus clearly on the task at hand.

meanings.definition: Relieved of a burden or burdens.
meanings.sent1: The unburdened soldier returned home from war.
meanings.sent2: The child's face lit up with joy when she felt unburdened.
meanings.sent3: The unburdened backpack seemed to float on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her unburdened shoulders felt lighter than air.
meanings.sent5: The unburdened heart danced with happiness.
